hgeColorRGB helper class

hgeColorRGB is a HGE helper class for ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color calculations.

hgeColorRGB methods

Constructors Create and initalize hgeColorRGB object.
Operators hgeColorRGB operators.
  
Clamp Clamps the color to the allowed range after calculations.
SetHWColor Sets hgeColorRGB value to a hardware color.
GetHWColor Returns hardware color from hgeColorRGB value.
